review: *** ******** ********* *** **** ***** He will give good guidance which will help to cure problems very soon. The doctor behavior was good. First, he listened to the problem properly and he suggested it very well. First time he prescribed medicine after some days he said taking more painkiller tablets are not good so if you have more pain than you can continue and his suggestion was helpful. There was not much waiting time for the doctor and I would like to recommend this doctor to others. During my discharge the staff were not cooperating well because they did not help with the billing process, it took a long time and it was needed for my office process and I am on bed due to hand fracture. The main problem is with staff and hospital other than everything was good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: My Mother is suffering from severe Osteoporosis due to steroids treatment for ILD (lung disease).  The line of treatment to treat bone density and increase bone strength was explained nicely by the doctor. Also prescribed a medicine for pain treatment using transdermal patch.

I had visited the hospital and it was knee pain. ********* *** **** ** ******* I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. Physiotherapy was suggested.

Doctor was sitting with his friend when I have entered his room . He was not really attentive and seems to be hurry to wind up. I would have appreciated him had he examined the Toe injury that I have reported and explained what is the cause and how to fix that permanently .
